# Structure data

Steps in data processing pipeline:

(1) Load csv file 

```{r loadData}
# STEP 1 #
d_raw <- read_csv(here::here("SCIP_summer-pilot_data_ALL.csv"))
head(d_raw)
```

(2) tidy data

```{r processing}
df_full <- d_raw %>% 
  mutate(subjectNum = factor(subjectNum)) %>% 
  mutate(gender = factor(gender)) %>% 
  mutate(ageGroup =ifelse(age < 4, 3, ifelse(age >= 5, 5, 4))) %>% 
  mutate(ageGroup = factor(ageGroup)) %>%
  mutate(trial = factor(trial)) %>% 
  arrange(age,subjectNum) %>% 
  gather(trial, accuracy, R1:CrB) %>% 
  mutate(trialType = "critical",
         trialType = ifelse(str_detect(trial, "G"), "gen", trialType),
         trialType = ifelse(str_detect(trial, "R"), "recap", trialType))

df_by_subj <- df %>% 
  group_by(ageGroup,subjectNum) %>% 
  summarise(acc = mean(accuracy)) 

df_by_age <- df %>% 
  group_by(ageGroup) %>% 
  summarise(acc = mean(accuracy)) 
  
  


d <- d_raw %>%
  gather(trial, correct, starts_with("t")) %>%
  mutate(trial_num = as.numeric(str_sub(trial, 2,3)), 
         trial_type = case_when(
           trial_num %in% c(1, 4, 6, 7) ~ "recap",
           trial_num %in% c(2, 5) ~ "generalization",
           trial_num %in% c(3, 8) ~ "critical"), 
         block = ifelse(trial_num < 5, 1, 2))
 


```
